summary.purpose: Provides four coloured truck SVG icon generator functions (red, yellow, green, gray) conforming to the VehicleSvg signature for use as map markers and menu icons.
summary.problem_solved: Supplies the truck vehicle type's state-specific icon variants so map and menu components can reflect real-time ignition and speed state visually.

exports.name: redTruckIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a red truck SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: yellowTruckIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a yellow truck SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: greenTruckIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a green truck SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: grayTruckIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a gray truck SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

symbols.name: redTruckIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a red truck SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Red truck icon SVG element. Red indicates ignition is off.

details.what_it_does: Generates a detailed truck SVG icon in red, indicating ignition is off.

minimal_correct.title: Render a red truck icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { redTruckIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = redTruckIcon('30', '30', '#FF0000', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: yellowTruckIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a yellow truck SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Yellow truck icon SVG element. Yellow indicates idling.

details.what_it_does: Generates a detailed truck SVG icon in yellow, indicating idle state.

minimal_correct.title: Render a yellow truck icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { yellowTruckIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = yellowTruckIcon('30', '30', '#FFFF00', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: greenTruckIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a green truck SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Green truck icon SVG element. Green indicates actively moving.

details.what_it_does: Generates a detailed truck SVG icon in green, indicating the truck is actively moving.

minimal_correct.title: Render a green truck icon
minimal_correct.code:

const icon = greenTruckIcon('30', '30', '#00FF00', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: grayTruckIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a gray truck SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').
